We are your progressive Law Partner.

We are one of the most reputed law firms in Kottayam, Pala, Ettumanoor with over 28 years of experience.

We find solutions to your Problems in the most Effective way.

History

Adv K M Santhosh Kumar & Associates, which was founded in 1994, a well-known law firm that offers a wide range of legal services to clients all over the world.

  • A reputed Law Firm from the past few decades.
  • We are headed by Advocate K M Santhoshkumar. A reputed advocate of the Ettumanoor, Kottayam, Pala, Viakom and nearby Courts
  • He has been a constant source of inspiration for us and has transformed this firm into an unrivaled entity.
  • We have been in this field for a long time and have acquired vast experience and knowledge.

Our Excellency

We deal in all kinds of documentations and litigations. Our firm provides these services to the esteemed clients spread all over the world.

  • With our team of expert legal professionals, We provide Legal Services like Criminal Law, Martimonial law, POCSO, Property Cases law, Domestic Violence Cases and Others.
  • We provide complete satisfaction to the clients whatever the situation may be.
  • We are known to provide each of the clients, special attention and taking utmost care in serving them in the best possible manner.

Our Projects

We deal with most types of Cases.
